creator: renaud.richardet@wyona.com
text:
If you go to the default publication homepage, and try to click on the menu
Workflow > Publish, you get kicked out. If you first submit, and then publish,
it works as expected (you can publish the page). 
Proposition: either disable menu Publish unless the page has been Submitted
first, or allow the page to be published in one click (without Submit-step).
Thanks, Renaud

Strange ... which LCR are you using? In my installation, the "publish" menu item
is disabled unless I submit the document.
creator: andreas@apache.org
renaud.richardet@wyona.com
text:
My bad, I used a tweaked version of Lenya. Just checked out a fresh version, and
it works fine.
Another question: after the page is published, the menu "publish" is still
accessible to me. Clicking on it will kick me out of Lenya. Any ideas? 
Thanks, Renaud
This bug may be related to http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=37602
creator: felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com
felix.roethenbacher@wyona.com
text:
Unify the two related bugs setting this to be a duplicate of
http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=37602

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 37602 ***
